about.not_lying:
You know how some people in job interviews say, "____ is my passion," and they're totally lying?
 I'm not. This is it. I love it.
about.hidden_chat: There's a live chat in here, did you find it?
about.contact_me: If you found it, contact me and tell me to get on, if you didn't find it, contact me anyway and I'll tell you how to get on.
about.navbar_info: In the navbar it should tell you when someone else connected so you can chat with everyone on here.

logos.goofy_stuff: I never get to make goofy stuff like this on client systems.
logos.not_enough_sides: Not enough sides on the cube...

chat_bot.title: AI Chat bots
chat_bot.info: AI chat bots for the desktop or integrated into your website, connecting to your favorite large language model.

project_management.title: Project Management
project_management.info: Web API and desktop application featuring real time collaboration and notifications.

kick_him.title: Kick Him in the Middle!
kick_him.info: A multiplayer fighting game I've been working on. You gotta kick the other guy in the middle and not get kicked to win.
kick_him.site: When it's playable I'll make a real site. This is just the code.

private_chats.title: Private Chats
private_chats.info: Extra private chatrooms. Messages self-delete after 30 seconds. Rooms auto delete after 10 seconds when no one is in them.

consultation.title: Consultation
consultation.info: This is the most important part. We discuss your goals and how to make them come to life.

proposal.title: Proposal
proposal.info: I send you a proposal that fits your budget.

creation.title: Creation
creation.info: I make the project. You will receive weekly updates.

launch.title: Launch and Support
launch.info: We're live. Ongoing support is available if needed.

chat_bot.sample: This is a sample of a chat bot.
chat_bot.details: It can look however you want, be wherever you want, and connect to any of the popular large language models.
chat_bot.whats_available: Website integration or desktop apps available.
